description: '''Sleaford Mods''' are an English [[post-punk]] music duo, formed in 2007 in [[Nottingham]]. The band features vocalist Jason Williamson and, since 2012, instrumentalist Andrew Fearn. They are known for their abrasive, minimalist musical style and embittered explorations of [[United Kingdom government austerity programme|austerity-era Britain]], culture, and [[working class]] life, delivered in Williamson's [[East Midlands]] accent. The duo have released several albums to critical praise.
